net.identio.saml

Class AuthentRequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.identio.saml.AuthentRequestBuilder

  • public class AuthentRequestBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    SAML authentication requests builder. This class must be used to generate a SAML request.
    Author:
    Loeiz TANGUY

        public AuthentRequest build()
                     throws TechnicalException
        Build the request
        Returns:
        Built request
        Throws:

      • build

        public AuthentRequest build(java.lang.String authentRequest,
                            boolean base64)
                     throws TechnicalException,
                            InvalidRequestException
        Build a request from a string containing a SAML request in XML form
        Parameters:
        authentRequest - String containing the request
        base64 - Boolean to indicate that the string is Base64-encoded
        Returns:
        Built request
        Throws:
        TechnicalException - Thrown when something went wrong when building the request
        InvalidRequestException - Thrown when the request doesn't have the awaited format
